title: Looking for New Zealand players to join a Gold+ team
body:
Title says it all. We are looking for players from New Zealand to create a team
Should be Gold+
We are looking to enter most, if not all, of the OCE Open Ladder tournaments and play and practice Ranked 5s throughout the season

Leave a comment below or add IGN: xRyuuk  if you are interested

replies.body: ummm.... interested. What's the recommended minimum to join? I'm silver 3 currently; still moving up. IGN: Frostwolf77.

IGN wolves you already have me added.

available all weekends but only after 11.30pm on weekdays so late night
